position: SDE-I @ Societe Generale | Specialized in Full Stack and Backend Solutions | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: - Engineered a data extraction tool with a React frontend and Spring Boot backend, reducing processing time by 80% for 200,000 entries, significantly boosting operational efficiency.- Developed scalable REST APIs with NestJS and Spring Boot, ensuring seamless data exchange and enhancing system resilience for high-volume transactions.- Implemented Excel upload and bulk delete functions in NestJS, reducing data entry time by 90% and processing 10,000 entries in under 60 seconds.- Achieved 90% storage efficiency by converting Trino query results to CSV and compressing into ZIP files for S3 upload.- Enhanced system stability by 25% through role-based access, audit trails, and thorough Jest and JUnit testing, reducing post-release bugs by 40%.- Orchestrated Kubernetes and Jenkins deployment for production, maintaining 99.99% uptime and reducing release time by 40%.
experience.description_html: - Engineered a data extraction tool with a React frontend and Spring Boot backend, reducing processing time by 80% for 200,000 entries, significantly boosting operational efficiency.- Developed scalable REST APIs with NestJS and Spring Boot, ensuring seamless data exchange and enhancing system resilience for high-volume transactions.- Implemented Excel upload and bulk delete functions in NestJS, reducing data entry time by 90% and processing 10,000 entries in under 60 seconds.- Achieved 90% storage efficiency by converting Trino query results to CSV and compressing into ZIP files for S3 upload.- Enhanced system stability by 25% through role-based access, audit trails, and thorough Jest and JUnit testing, reducing post-release bugs by 40%.- Orchestrated Kubernetes and Jenkins deployment for production, maintaining 99.99% uptime and reducing release time by 40%.
